root.name: Ball Fighter
root.description: OverviewBall Fighter is a puzzle game developed and published by Teyon for the DSiWare platform.GameplayIn Ball Fighter the goal is to try and clear the stage of the colored orbs. The player controls a hand at the bottom of the screen that can grab any number of the same colored orb that are touching from a single column. These orbs can then be moved and placed in another column. As long as three or more of the colored orbs are placed in the same column, they will be destroyed.
